name: The Enchickening
description:
An evil AI calling itself "The Chicken Master" has turned all the scientists into chickens. Again. It is up to you to bring the brainless poultry to the transmogrifier to change them back.

This is a game jam game, made in 48 hours for the first JS48. Mostly I was experimenting with pathfinding and AI. All art, sound & music, most of it made during the weekend.

(Once the jam finished I changed this so that it uses WASD + Enter instead of Cursors + Space so that it works properly when inside an iframe.)
